subject: RE: Merchandise photos

full_threads.body:
Excellent thanks Heath!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming both the AU and GLOBAL sites are setup with the Stripe AU account now. The order confirmation emails are being sent to hello@acoufelt.com. 

Please see attached the 2 tests I did. I created a coupon code called HMTESTER. You can also use this when testing to bring the price right down to 50c. Just make sure you match the same products that I used.

Also heath - are you able to please run a test for me to ensure payment/process is working and feeding through to the right people? Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Awesome thanks Heath - it's now working on my end 😊

Let's have global attached to the AU Stripe account please. Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

We have cleared the server cache, can you please try now? Please see the attached screen shot as a reference. 
Also, which Stripe account should we use for the Global site?

Hey Heath,

Not sure this is working - its saying no payment options available? Am I doing something wrong?



Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

The merch is on the AU and Global sites. 

https://acoufelt.com/au/merchandise/
https://acoufelt.com/merchandise/

The AU site is setup to run on the AU Stripe account. Did you want the Global site to use the AU of US(LLC) Stripe account?
Regarding the qty fields
@heath @glen all good now on this one.

@joel can you please have a look at the quantity fields on the add to cart buttons for the global site: e.g. https://acoufelt.com/product/felt-coaster-pack-of-5/

Thanks!

hi @heath can you check the merchandise page that I've made for the global site? thanks
https://acoufelt.com/merchandise/

i have problem regarding the add to cart button.

Hey Heath,

Is our stripe account set up now? Happy to use that otherwise did we previously have woocommerce set up? I'm not fussed on either so long as they work.

Happy for you to start setting this up on the Au site. Ta!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

please check madam @rica
